TEXT_DICT.title: Haberdashery
TEXT_DICT.animatedRelics_tooltip: Some relics are animated on the character.
TEXT_DICT.playSfx_tooltip: A few relics will occasionally play sounds.

TEXT_DICT.exclusion_body: You have two relics that cannot both be displayed on your character at the same time. NL To customize which relic is displayed, click the above button.
